text: {{Infobox Writer | name = Madame de La Fayette | image = Madame de La Fayette.jpg | birth_date = | birth_place = Paris, France | death_date = | death_place = Paris, France | occupation = Novelist | notableworks = La Princesse de Clèves }} Marie-Madeleine Pioche de La Vergne, countess of La Fayette (or Lafayette) was a French writer. She is commonly known as Madame de Lafayette. She was born on 18 March 1634 in Paris, and died there, on 26 May 1693. In 1678, she published the novel La Princesse de Clèves (the Princess of Clèves). This book is regarded as one of the first psychological novels. Category:1634 births Category:1693 deaths Category:French novelists
title: Madame de La Fayette
